original_text: They take things away from women after their husbands have died, even their houses. Then they pray for a long time so that other people will praise them. Because they do these things, God will punish those men much more than other people.’
korean_text: 그들은 과부의 가산을 삼키며 외식으로 길게 기도하니 그들이 더 엄중한 심판을 받으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: They take things away from women after their husbands have died
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 남편들이 죽은 후에 여자들에게서 물건을 빼앗습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they pray for a long time
so that other people will praise them
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람들이 그들을 칭찬하게 하기 위해서입니다

sentences.original_text: God will punish those men much more than other people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그 남자들을 다른 사람들보다 훨씬 더 심하게 벌하실 것입니다
